thread.title: Dion Lewis limited in practice after suffering abdomen injury | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian
thread.title_full: Dion Lewis limited in practice after suffering abdomen injury | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian | Boston Herald

author: Jeff Howe
title: Dion Lewis limited in practice after suffering abdomen injury | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian
text:
Dion Lewis is on the injury report for the first time this season. The running back suffered an abdomen injury and was limited during today's practice. The extent of the injury is not clear.
Here is the full injury report.
Did not participate:
CB Tarell Brown (foot)
Limited:
DE Trey Flowers (shoulder, knee)
LB Dont'a Hightower (ribs)
RB Dion Lewis (abdomen)
